channel.title: [BIG Problem on 317]Must see this can be even on your server!
channel.description:
So, just finished my project.. Just 2 problem's i dont understand.. When i do something to update(i mean code something and compile) and logging in with my char it spawns as new.. Sometimes even if didnt update the server.. And sometimes i try to login it shows me this in my server console [code] Connection from localhost:1058 [client-2-Beershake]: Loading Process Completed [Normal player, lag: 297 ms ] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) ClientHandler: Client Beershake disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:1059 Disconnecting bugged player Beershake ClientHandler: Client Beershake disconnected (localhost) null null null java.lang.NullPointerException at client.setSkillLevel(client.java:17836) at client.loadgame(client.java:9706) at client.run(client.java:17016) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection from localhost:1060 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:9822) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:452) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:444) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:339) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8559) at client.run(client.java:16674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] But when i retry it lets me login and reset my char as new. Or if i set my rights to 1 or 2 or 3 or higher and login sucessful without any reset it just disappaer after 10-15 mins im on and dont gives me logout and Im still with crown. So problem is with player rights and something not good with my source. And i dont want to change my source to any other because i done to much. P.S. It was always..(i mean at the start i started code the source) But i didnt knew that it has this problem so coded a lot..
Im useing Demise's PKING V5 source Please help me with this!!! :(
If it will be loads of help i even gonna pay for it!!! :confused:

item.title: [BIG Problem on 317]Must see this can be even on your server!
item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd
item.description:
@570fd wrote:

So, just finished my project… Just 2 problem’s i dont understand…
When i do something to update(i mean code something and compile) and logging in with my char it spawns as new… Sometimes even if didnt update the server…
And sometimes i try to login it shows me this in my server console

Connection from localhost:1058 [client-2-Beershake]: Loading Process Completed [Normal player, lag: 297 ms ] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) ClientHandler: Client Beershake disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:1059 Disconnecting bugged player Beershake ClientHandler: Client Beershake disconnected (localhost) null null null java.lang.NullPointerException at client.setSkillLevel(client.java:17836) at client.loadgame(client.java:9706) at client.run(client.java:17016) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection from localhost:1060 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:9822) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:452) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:444) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:339) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8559) at client.run(client.java:16674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
But when i retry it lets me login and reset my char as new.
Or if i set my rights to 1 or 2 or 3 or higher and login sucessful without any reset it just disappaer after 10-15 mins im on and dont gives me logout and Im still with crown.
So problem is with player rights and something not good with my source.
And i dont want to change my source to any other because i done to much.
P.S. It was always…(i mean at the start i started code the source)
But i didnt knew that it has this problem so coded a lot…

Im useing Demise’s PKING V5 source
Please help me with this!!!

If it will be loads of help i even gonna pay for it!!!

Read full topic
